data.name: Voidwalkers: The Gates Of Hell
data.detailed_description:
Voidwalkers - Hell's Gate is an online zombie shooting game that you can play for free!

You are one of the Voidwalkers, tasked with a life-long oath to defend the Gates Of Hell from any who would try to cross into the land of the living.

After a thousand years without incident, you have finally heard a distress call coming from a station guarding the gate.

Thousands of undead warriors have begun crossing the plane, and it's up to you to stop them!

If you are a fan of zombie killing games or if you love playing combat zombie action games, then this is a zombie shooting games that you'll love!

Voidwalkers - Hell's Gate has incredible gameplay, top-notch animations, and mesmerizing sound effects to keep you engaged for hours!

This 3D shooter will delight anyone who is a fan of gun games or zombie killing games.


Action zombie games have huge popularity among the z shooter game lovers, and they always enjoy, and this is one of those fun action games that all zombie games lovers will enjoy playing.
You'll be placed in one of the crossing-points where the zombies will try to catch and eat you alive.
Your job is to run around the area as one of the zombie apocalypse survivors and shoot and kill your undead rivals while keeping a safe distance to avoid getting bitten by the dead rising corpses.
This is one of those zombie shooting games for free that you can play for hours and have a fun action gaming session when you are bored or feel like having some fun with zombie games.

This zombie slayer game has some really incredible features that will make any action games fan or zombie games fan delighted.
It's a great time pass and an amazing source of entertainment to have on your device. Take a look at some of the incredible features of this zombie shooter game.

The Gameplay:
Create a server and join your allies in a non-stop battle to destroy the undead!
Each kill earns cash that you can use to buy new items and weapons from the store!

Key Features:


Amazing graphics and sound:
This gun shooter game with zombies will catch your attention and delight you to the fullest from the first frame.
The design of the environment and objects are detailed and vivid.
If you are looking for high graphic games with zombies then this is one of the best zombie games with amazing graphics and sound.
The sound effects and music tracks are real and smooth. Therefore, if you'd like to play some best zombie games with incredible graphics and sound, then this one is for you.

Purchase New Weapons!

Customize Your Character By Purchasing The Character Editor!

Free zombie action:
If you are looking for best zombie action games or free and zombie shooting games, then this zombie slayer game is for you.

Download and enjoy Voidwalkers - Hell's Gate for free at all times!

data.short_description: You are one of the Voidwalkers, tasked with a life-long oath to defend the Gates Of Hell from any who would try to cross into the land of the living. After a thousand years without incident, thousands of undead warriors have begun crossing the plane, and it's up to you to stop them!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB / GTX 1050 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2600 CPU @ 3.40 GHz - 3.70 GHZ (Or equivalent AMD CPU)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 (Or equivalent AMD GPU)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 12 sound device

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB / GTX 1050 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850.
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 sound device
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 19.04
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2600 CPU @ 3.40 GHz - 3.70 GHZ (Or equivalent AMD CPU)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 (Or equivalent AMD GPU)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 12 sound device

movies.name: Voidwalkers: The Gates Of Hell Gameplay Trailer

content_descriptors.notes: The game is violent by nature and contains blood and gore seen from a first-person-perspective.
